name: TPS: Top Person Shooter
description:
In TPS: Top Person Shooter, you can switch between first-person and top-down views. Your goal is to shoot your enemy, but you can only move while in top-down mode, and only shoot in first-person mode. Oh, and the enemy also mirrors your movement, and has a deadly force-field which expands over time.

List of fixes for TPS version 1.0.1:

  • Made instructions more clear
  • Moved some buttons (just a little)
  • Adjusted font sizes

List of fixes for TPS version 1.0.2:

  • Removed sidebars
  • Changed some colors
